title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Agile Evidence-Based Healthcare Professional Education Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can clearly define instructional design problems using the LICO (Learner, Intervention, Context, Outcome) framework.
Learners can critically evaluate educational research evidence by applying the QSR (Quality, Strength, Relevance) criteria.
Learners can develop and improve educational prototypes on a biweekly basis using agile design sprints.
Learners can complete medical education module design projects in multidisciplinary team collaboration environments.
Learners can continuously monitor and adjust the effectiveness of instructional design using formative assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
